title: Holes in Coherence

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of an unfinished building skeleton against the sky, steel beams reaching upward, but with one perfectly broken window already installed—contradiction made visible
Close-up through the broken window showing light streaming through the hole, creating patterns that reveal hidden dimensions in the unfinished structure

transformation_notes: The unfinished building with its broken window becomes a metaphor for consciousness itself—always under construction yet already containing the cracks that let truth shine through.
